resources.string: 1 - To answer a question, the user must be less than 50 meters from the point of interest.
2 - When you are less than 50 meters from the point of interest, the user will receive a notification.
3 - When arriving at the location of the question, the user must continuously click on the marker until the question appears.
4 - The objective is to complete the route as quickly as possible and obtain the highest number of points.
5 - After the game, check your ranking on the Leaderboard and compare it with other users of the application.
The Peddy paper aims to make the city of Felgueiras known.
Throughout the Peddy paper, you will find several points of interest and learn about its history.
Before playing, read the game rules.
